sky.name: 鋼鐵天空下
sky.original_desc: Beneath A Steel Sky (BASS) is set in a post-apocalyptic Australia where you're an orphan living with a tribe in the wastelands the 'gap' when a helicopter comes to take you to the enormous Union City. The game starts with the helicopter crashing down in the city and you making your escape into one of the large tall plants. Your goal? To discover who you really are and why you were taken to the city.
sky.desc: 《鋼鐵天空下》(BASS) 的故事發生在後世界末日的澳大利亞，你是一名孤兒，與荒原上的一個部落生活在一起，當一架直升機飛來帶你前往巨大的聯合市時，“間隙”。遊戲從直升機在城市墜毀開始，你逃進一棵大型高大的植物中。你的目標？發現你到底是誰以及為什麼你被帶到這座城市。

longbow.original_name: Conquests Of The Longbow - The Legend Of Robin Hood
longbow.name: 長弓的征服 - 羅賓漢傳奇
longbow.original_desc:
The year is 1193, and the Third Crusade has just ended. Richard the Lionheart, King of England, returns to Europe from the Holy Land. On the way, he is ambushed and abducted by the soldiers of the Austrian duke Leopold who demands a large ransom to be paid in exchange for the king's freedom. That is when the legendary Robin Hood, one who robs from the rich and gives to the poor, decides to raise the money needed to liberate the king, with the help of his fellow outlaws of Sherwood Forest.

Armed with logic, creativity and moral judgement, you'll face some of the most intricate and challenging puzzles you've ever seen. Many puzzles have multiple solutions with varying implications - some more desirable than others. Even the game itself has at least five possible endings.
longbow.desc:
公元1193年，第三次十字軍東征剛剛結束。英國國王狮心王理查從聖地返回歐洲。途中，他遭到奧地利公爵利奧波德的士兵伏擊和綁架，後者要求支付大筆贖金以換取國王的自由。就在那時，傳說中的羅賓漢，一個劫富濟貧的人，決定在舍伍德森林的亡命之徒同伙的幫助下籌集解放國王所需的資金。

憑藉邏輯、創造力和道德判斷力，你將面對一些你所見過的最複雜和最具挑戰性的謎題。許多謎題都有多種解決方案，其含義各不相同——有些比其他的更令人滿意。甚至遊戲本身也至少有五個可能的結局。

tentacle.name: 觸手之日
tentacle.original_desc: Dr. Fred's mutated purple tentacle is out to take over the world. And only you can stop him. Travel through time with three outrageous characters in this wacky graphic adventure which features cartoon-style animation and over 100 zany sound effects.
tentacle.desc: 弗雷德博士變異的紫色觸手即將統治世界。只有你才能阻止他。在這個古怪的圖形冒險遊戲中，與三個怪誕的角色一起穿越時空，其中包含卡通風格的動畫和 100 多種滑稽的音效。

dw.name: 碟形世界
dw.original_desc:
A dragon is summoned by a group of mysterious conspirators and now terrorizes the city state of Ankh-Morpork. Being the most expendable wizard of the Unseen University, Rincewind is given the task to get rid of the beast.
		
Discworld is an adventure game loosely based on the novel "Guards! Guards!" by Terry Pratchett that puts the player in the shoes of Rincewind, a wizard whose sole purpose in life is to stay alive. He appears to be very good at it as well, because apparently the universe has decided to continuously challenge him. The game takes place in the humorous fantasy world called Discworld, as it is actually a flat disc carried on the backs of four gigantic elephants, which themselves stand on the back of an even larger turtle.
dw.desc:
一群神秘陰謀者召喚了一條龍，現在它正在威脅安科-莫波克城邦。作為隱形大學最值得犧牲的巫師，Rincewind 被賦予了除掉野獸的任務。

《Discworld》是一款根據小說《守衛！守衛！ 》改編的冒險遊戲。由特里·普拉切特 (Terry Pratchett) 創作，玩家將扮演靈思風 (Rincewind) 的角色，一位巫師，其人生的唯一目的就是活下去。他似乎也很擅長，因為顯然宇宙已經決定不斷挑戰他。遊戲發生在名為“圓盤世界”的幽默奇幻世界中，因為它實際上是四隻巨大大象背上攜帶的扁平圓盤，而大象本身又站在一隻更大的烏龜背上。

drascula.name: 德拉斯庫拉：吸血鬼反擊
drascula.original_desc: You are John Hacker, a common guy sent by a British property company to speak with 'Count DrÃ¡scula' about some lands. By chance you meet a gorgeous blond girl who is kidnapped by the Count himself, and you, John Hacker, set on a fun yet dangerous quest t
drascula.desc: 你是約翰·哈克（John Hacker），一個被英國房地產公司派去與“德拉斯庫拉伯爵”談論一些土地問題的普通人。一次偶然的機會，你遇到了一位美麗的金發女孩，她被伯爵本人綁架了，而你，約翰·哈克，開始了一項有趣但危險的任務：

elvira1.name: 埃爾維拉 - 黑暗情婦
elvira1.original_desc: "Can somebody help me find my chest? No really, I'm serious! See, I've been remodeling this cold and moldy castle, right? So how was I to know that I'd wake up Queen Emelda - especially since the old bat croaked hundreds of years ago! Anyway, Queenie-dearie wants to come back from the dead and rule the world - and the only way I can stop her and her monstrous minions is to find a secret scroll of spells, hidden in a big chest somewhere in this huge 800-room castle. Won't you help your poor, innocent little Mistress?" Yours cruelly - Elvira
elvira1.desc: “有人能幫我找到我的箱子嗎？不，真的，我是認真的！看，我一直在改造這座寒冷發霉的城堡，對嗎？所以我怎麼知道我會喚醒艾梅爾達女王——尤其是因為那隻老蝙蝠在數百年前就已經呱呱叫了！不管怎樣，親愛的奎妮想要死而復生並統治世界——而我阻止她和她那可怕的爪牙的唯一方法就是找到隱藏在一個大箱子裡的秘密咒語捲軸在這座擁有 800 個房間的巨大城堡的某個地方，你願意幫助你可憐的、無辜的小女主人嗎？”你的殘酷 - 埃爾維拉

elvira2.name: 埃爾維拉 2 - 地獄犬之顎
elvira2.original_desc: An evil force has penetrated our universe, possessing Black Widow Productions in Hollywood. The studio owner, Elvira herself, has vanished. Now three cavernous movie sets - a graveyard, a haunted house, and catacombs - are erupting with the most hideous monsters of gothic horror. Your quest? Find and rescue Elvira from these three craven worlds then fight a final cataclysmic battle with a netherworld entity of awesome dimension and fury!
elvira2.desc: 一股邪惡力量已經滲透到我們的宇宙中，佔領了好萊塢的黑寡婦製片公司。工作室老闆埃爾維拉本人失踪了。現在，三個巨大的電影場景——墓地、鬼屋和地下墓穴——正在爆發出最可怕的哥特式恐怖怪物。你的追求？從這三個膽怯的世界中找到並營救埃爾維拉，然後與一個具有令人敬畏的尺寸和憤怒的地獄實體進行最後的災難性戰鬥！

queen.name: 亞馬遜女王的飛行
queen.original_desc: Flight of the Amazon Queen follows a pilot for hire named Joe King who is hired to fly a famous actress to her next job, but ends up in a lightning storm and crashes deep in the Amazon Jungle. In the jungle, Joe uncovers a plot by a mad scientist to take over the world by creating an army of dinosaur women created from Amazon women.
queen.desc: 《亞馬遜女王的飛行》講述了一位名叫喬·金的僱傭飛行員的故事，他受僱為一位著名女演員運送下一份工作，但最終卻在一場閃電風暴中墜毀在亞馬遜叢林深處。在叢林中，喬揭露了一位瘋狂科學家的陰謀，他想通過亞馬遜女性創造一支恐龍女性軍隊來統治世界。

ft.name: 假面騎士×假面騎士 Drive & 鎧武 MOVIE大戰 Full Throttle
ft.original_desc:
Full Throttle' scorches the screen like an exhaust pipe on an exposed leg. You're Ben - deserted, left for dead and framed for murder. You'll do anything to clear your name. Like running big rigs off the road at 100 mph. And if a few butt-ugly bikers get the crap kicked out of them in the process, hey, that's life. It's big bad bikes, big bad gangs in a big bad world. It's Full Throttle. Where the courtroom is the street, and the judge is a tire iron.
		
Non-stop action as you run from the law, get into fights, and ride big bikes in this rough and tumble, knock-down, drag-out. action and adventure spectacle from LucasArts.
ft.desc:
“全油門”燒焦了屏幕，就像裸露的腿上的排氣管一樣。你是本——被遺棄，被遺棄，並被陷害謀殺。你會做任何事情來洗清自己的罪名。就像以 100 英里/小時的速度在公路上運行大型鑽機一樣。如果一些屁股醜陋的騎自行車的人在這個過程中被踢出屎，嘿，這就是生活。這是一個大壞世界裡的大壞自行車、大壞幫派。這是全油門。法庭就是街道，法官就是輪胎熨斗。

當你逃避法律、捲入打鬥、騎著大型自行車，在這場混亂、翻滾、擊倒、拖拽中，不間斷的行動。LucasArts 的動作和冒險奇觀。

fw.name: 未來戰爭：時空歷險記
fw.original_desc:
In the year 1989, a window washer finds himself caught in the middle of a war between two alien races. He has to travel through time in order to keep the aliens from destroying each other and also save a kidnapped princess in the process.

Future Wars is the first game to use Delphine's proprietary Cinematique point-and-click interface, it is played by left-clicking for character movement, and right-clicking for character actions. The actions available in the right-click popup menu are: Operate, Examine, Take, Use and Inventory. "Use" had a subcategory which enabled the player to drag and select the items in their inventory.
fw.desc:
1989 年，一名窗戶清潔工發現自己陷入了兩個外星種族之間的戰爭。他必須穿越時空，防止外星人互相毀滅，並在此過程中拯救被綁架的公主。

《未來戰爭》是第一款使用 Delphine 專有的 Cinematique 點擊界面的遊戲，通過左鍵單擊進行角色移動，右鍵單擊進行角色動作。右鍵單擊彈出菜單中可用的操作有：操作、檢查、獲取、使用和盤點。“使用”有一個子類別，使玩家能夠拖動並選擇庫存中的物品。

gob1.name: 哥布林
gob1.original_desc: Guide these three comical goblins on their quest to find a remedy for their King's illness - he's gone raving mad! Steer them through strange countries scattered with puzzling challenges by selecting one at a time and making the best use of his skills. One is a magician who casts spells, one is a warrior who hits with his fists and the other a technician who makes use of the objects he collects on his way. Become completely spellbound with the exceptionally humorous and addictive action-adventure!
gob1.desc: 引導這三個滑稽的妖精尋找治療國王疾病的方法——他已經瘋了！一次選擇一個國家並充分利用他的技能，引導他們穿越遍布著令人費解的挑戰的陌生國家。一個是施展法術的魔法師，一個是用拳頭擊打的戰士，另一個是利用他在途中收集的物品的技術人員。沉浸在異常幽默且令人上癮的動作冒險遊戲中！

gob2.name: 妖精2：小丑王子
gob2.original_desc:
The second in the series of adventure-puzzle games. In this installation, you only have two imps to control instead of three.

Someone has kidnapped the prince and it's up to you and two hilarious sidekicks, Winkle and Fingus, to rescue him. Winkle is a reckless jokester, while Fingus is careful and has a gift for solving puzzles. Luckily, they're blessed with extraordinary vitality. In other words, they never die. That'll sure come in handy when you're up against Wily Wizard's traps, maniacal monsters, and twisted and perplexing puzzles.
gob2.desc:
冒險益智遊戲系列的第二款。在此安裝中，您只需控制兩個小惡魔，而不是三個。

有人綁架了王子，你和兩個滑稽的伙伴溫克爾和芬格斯要去營救他。溫克爾是一個魯莽的愛開玩笑的人，而芬格斯則很小心，並且有解決謎題的天賦。幸運的是，他們擁有非凡的生命力。換句話說，他們永遠不會死。當你面對狡猾的巫師的陷阱、瘋狂的怪物和扭曲而令人費解的謎題時，這肯定會派上用場。

gob3.name: 哥布林探險 3
gob3.original_desc: This is the third game in the goblins adventure puzzle series. In this game, there is only one goblin, Blount, rather than the previous three and two goblins found in the first and second game (hence the name having one "i" instead of two or three). The hero gets assistance from a number of sidekicks throughout the game including Chump the parrot, Ooya the magician, and Fulbert the snake. Blount is also eaten by a wolf early in the game and after escaping from the afterlife must contend with semi-frequent changes into a super-strong but uncouth werewolf alter ego. Most areas in Goblins 3 are larger than the screen and thus scroll. It is also possible to travel back and forth between rooms.
gob3.desc: 這是妖精冒險解謎系列的第三款遊戲。在這個遊戲中，只有一個妖精，布朗特，而不是之前在第一和第二場遊戲中發現的三個和兩個妖精（因此名稱中有一個“i”而不是兩個或三個）。英雄在整個遊戲中得到了許多夥伴的幫助，包括鸚鵡 Chump、魔術師 Ooya 和蛇 Fulbert。布朗特也在遊戲初期被狼吃掉，在逃離來世後必須應對半頻繁的變化，變成一個超級強大但粗魯的狼人另一個自我。《哥布林 3》中的大部分區域都比屏幕大，因此可以滾動。也可以在房間之間來回移動。

atlantis.original_name: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis
atlantis.name: 印第安納瓊斯與亞特蘭蒂斯的命運
atlantis.original_desc: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis is a point-and-click adventure game by LucasArts originally released in 1992. Almost a year later, it was reissued on CD-ROM as an enhanced talkie edition with full voice acting and digitized sound effects. In 2009, this version was also released as an unlockable extra of the Wii action game Indiana Jones and the Staff of Kings, and as a digitally distributed Steam title. The seventh game to use the script language SCUMM, Fate of Atlantis has the player explore environments and interact with objects and characters by using commands constructed with predetermined verbs. It features three unique paths to select, influencing story development, gameplay and puzzles. The game used an updated SCUMM engine and required a 286-based PC, although it still runs as a real-mode DOS application. The CD talkie version required EMS memory enabled to load the voice data.
atlantis.desc: 《印第安納瓊斯與亞特蘭蒂斯的命運》是 LucasArts 於 1992 年推出的一款點擊式冒險遊戲。大約一年後，該遊戲以 CD-ROM 形式重新發行，作為具有完整配音和數字化音效的增強版有聲版本。2009 年，該版本還作為 Wii 動作遊戲《印第安納瓊斯與國王之杖》的可解鎖附加內容以及數字發行的 Steam 遊戲發布。《亞特蘭蒂斯的命運》是第七款使用 SCUMM 腳本語言的遊戲，玩家可以使用預先確定的動詞構建的命令來探索環境並與物體和角色進行交互。它具有三種獨特的選擇路徑，影響故事的發展、遊戲玩法和謎題。該遊戲使用了更新的 SCUMM 引擎，並且需要基於 286 的 PC，儘管它仍然作為實模式 DOS 應用程序運行。CD 對講機版本需要啟用 EMS 內存來加載語音數據。

indy3.original_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
indy3.name: 印第安納瓊斯與最後的十字軍東征
indy3.original_desc: Europe, 1938. The Lost Ark was just a warm-up! Now Adolf Hitler is after the most powerful talisman of all - the Holy Grail. A few brave men stand in his way. Fortunately, one of them is Indiana Jones. And this time, he has his dad with him. The bad guys are in your face all the way - Nazis, mercenaries, traitors and spies. Not to mention everything the Luftwaffe can throw at you. Can you handle the heat? If you can, you just might earn a higher I.Q. (Indy Quotient) than the man with the whip and the hat.
indy3.desc: 歐洲，1938 年。失落的方舟只是一個熱身！現在阿道夫·希特勒正在尋找最強大的護身符——聖杯。幾個勇敢的人擋住了他的路。幸運的是，印第安納·瓊斯就是其中之一。而這一次，他的爸爸也陪在了他身邊。壞人一路就在你面前——納粹、僱傭兵、叛徒和間諜。更不用說德國空軍可以向您扔出的一切。你能承受高溫嗎？如果可以的話，你可能會獲得更高的智商。（印地商數）比拿著鞭子和帽子的人還要多。

kq5.original_name: King's Quest V: Absence Makes the Heart Go Yonder!
kq5.name: 國王密使 V：缺席讓心飛向遠方！
kq5.original_desc:
When king Graham returns from a walk, he finds his castle and family missing. Luckily a talking owl, named Cedric, has witnessed what happened. He tells Graham that an evil wizard, Mordack, has kidnapped his family, and decides to help Graham. Cedric takes Graham to his master Crispin in Serenia. Crispin, a good wizard, gives Graham his old wand and tells Cedric to join Graham on his quest.

The game uses Sierra's SCI engine, a point-and-click interface, and has VGA graphics. King's Quest V was first released on floppy and later on CD-ROM with speech.
kq5.desc:
當格雷厄姆國王散步回來時，他發現他的城堡和家人失踪了。幸運的是，一隻名叫塞德里克的會說話的貓頭鷹目睹了發生的事情。他告訴格雷厄姆，邪惡的巫師莫達克綁架了他的家人，並決定幫助格雷厄姆。塞德里克帶格雷厄姆去塞雷尼亞見他的主人克里斯平。克里斯平是一位優秀的巫師，他給了格雷厄姆他的舊魔杖，並告訴塞德里克和格雷厄姆一起完成他的任務。

該遊戲使用 Sierra 的 SCI 引擎、點擊式界面，並具有 VGA 圖形。《國王密使 V》首先以軟盤形式發行，後來以帶有語音的 CD-ROM 形式發行。

kq6.original_name: King's Quest VI: Heir Today, Gone Tomorrow
kq6.name: 國王密使 VI：今日的繼承人，明日的離去
kq6.original_desc: For months Prince Alexander of Daventry has shut himself away from the world, thinking only of Princess Cassima, who he met while imprisoned in the previous game. Eventually he can take it no longer, and he hires a ship to search for the Land of the Green Isles located on the edge of the world. After months of searching he finally sets sight upon the island kingdom, only for a freak storm to strike the ship, destroying it and leaving him the only survivor. His troubles are far from over, however, as he soon finds out that the King and Queen have passed away, the Greens Isles are on the brink of war, and his beloved Princess Cassima may even be held prisoner by the royal vizier.Like its predecessors in the series, King's Quest VI: Heir Today, Gone Tomorrow is a third-person puzzle-solving adventure game. For Alexander to save the Isles, he must travel between the Land's four magical islands, each based on myth and fables, and encounter people and strange beasts that will either help or hinder him. Alexander must be careful as well, because, as with all the King's Quest games, poor choices or missteps will often prove fatal for the Prince. Puzzles are solved linearly, although late in the game there are two completely different paths to take to reach the final confrontation. Like the previous game, actions are performed using a point-and-click interface with icons that represent verbs ("walk", "examine", "use", "talk", etc.). The CD-ROM version of the game includes both DOS and Windows versions, full speech, a pre-rendered introduction, and the Girl in the Tower theme song.
kq6.desc: 達文特里的亞歷山大王子幾個月來一直將自己與世隔絕，只想著他在上一款遊戲中被監禁時遇到的卡西瑪公主。最終他再也無法忍受，他租了一艘船去尋找位於世界邊緣的綠島之地。經過幾個月的尋找，他終於看到了這個島嶼王國，卻發現一場反常的風暴襲擊了這艘船，摧毀了它，讓他成為唯一的倖存者。然而，他的麻煩還遠未結束，他很快發現國王和王后已經去世，綠島正處於戰爭邊緣，他心愛的卡西瑪公主甚至可能被皇家維齊爾囚禁。 與該系列的前作一樣，《國王密使 VI：今天的繼承人，明天的繼承人》是一款第三人稱解謎冒險遊戲。為了拯救群島，亞歷山大必須在這片土地的四個神奇島嶼之間旅行，每個島嶼都基於神話和寓言，並遇到會幫助或阻礙他的人和奇怪的野獸。亞歷山大也必須小心，因為與所有《國王密使》遊戲一樣，糟糕的選擇或失誤往往會對王子造成致命的傷害。謎題是線性解決的，儘管在遊戲後期有兩條完全不同的路徑可以到達最終的對抗。與之前的遊戲一樣，操作是使用點擊式界面來執行的，其中的圖標代表動詞（“行走”、“檢查”、“使用”、“交談”等）。遊戲的 CD-ROM 版本包括 DOS 和 Windows 版本、完整演講、預渲染的介紹以及塔中女孩主題曲。

kq1sci.original_name: King's Quest I: Quest For The Crown
kq1sci.name: 神話任務
kq1sci.original_desc: This is the remake of King's Quest: Quest for the Crown, written and designed by Roberta Williams, the first game to use Sierra's first AGI game, which saved the company from imminent bankruptcy in 1984. Using Sierra's newer SCI engine, the re-release supports brand new and more detailed graphics, soundcard and mouse support. It was also the first of the classic Sierra adventure games to be re-released as such. Later re-releases of Leisure Suit Larry 1, Space Quest 1, Police Quest 1 and Quest for Glory 1 all featured VGA graphics, unlike this game which still has EGA graphics. Though Sierra considered remaking King's Quest 2 as well, that plan was canceled due to disappointing sales of this first re-release. The game was however remade with VGA graphics by fan-based AGD Interactive in 2001. King's Quest 1 (SCI) was released for the PC (DOS) and the Amiga and is included in all King's Quest collections.
kq1sci.desc: 這是 King's Quest: Quest for the Crown 的重製版，由 Roberta Williams 編寫和設計，是第一款使用 Sierra 首款 AGI 遊戲的遊戲，該遊戲使該公司在 1984 年免於瀕臨破產。使用 Sierra 更新的 SCI 引擎，重新發布的版本支持全新且更詳細的圖形、聲卡和鼠標支持。這也是第一款重新發行的經典塞拉利昂冒險遊戲。後來重新發布的《Leisure Suit Larry 1》、《Space Quest 1》、《Police Quest 1》和《Quest for Glory 1》均採用 VGA 顯卡，而這款遊戲仍然採用 EGA 顯卡。儘管塞拉也考慮過重製《國王密使 2》，但由於首次重製版的銷量令人失望，該計劃被取消。然而，2001 年，基於粉絲的 AGD Interactive 採用 VGA 圖形重新製作了該遊戲。 King's Quest 1 (SCI) 發布了 PC (DOS) 和 Amiga 版本，並包含在所有 King's Quest 系列中。

lol.original_name: Lands Of Lore - The Throne Of Chaos
lol.name: 傳說之地 - 混沌王座
lol.original_desc: The Dark Army is on the move again, led by the evil sorceress Scotia. Her goal is obvious: to destroy Gladstone Keep and its ruler King Richard. Scotia herself has recently become more powerful after acquiring "the Mask" from the Urban Mines, gaining the ability to shape-shift. She is virtually unstoppable and able to infiltrate Gladstone Keep, poisoning King Richard. If it were not for the intervention of Sorceress Dawn, the monarch would surely be dead. In order to find a cure for the King's illness, a band of heroes must set out on an adventure, and keep themselves alive from the Dark Army forces.Lands of Lore: Throne of Chaos is a real-time dungeon-crawling role-playing game viewed from a first-person perspective. Players begin by choosing one of the four available protagonists: the Dracoid Ak'shel (high magic power), the Huline Kieran (high speed), and two humans: Michael (high strength) and Conrad (balanced character). Each has his weaknesses and strengths, but all abilities in the game can be eventually upgraded.Much of the game consists of exploring pseudo-3D maze-like dungeons. Most of them contain secret areas and it is sometimes necessary to solve puzzles to advance. Real-time combat involves clicking on either the attack or magic icon for each character. Depending on their speed attribute they will need a certain amount of cooldown time before the player can activate them again. The point-and-click interface allows interaction with some background objects, sometimes eliciting comments from the protagonist or his companions.The game does not feature manual character development, introducing instead a semi-automatic form of leveling up, where skills of the hero and the companions are divided into Fighting, Magic and Rogue skills. Each skill level will increase when killing enemies using a particular type of attack: melee weapons increase the Fighting skills, magic increases the Magic skill, and ranged weapons increase the Rogue skills. In the course of the game players will form a party of up to three heroes in the quest for the cure. The player is able to equip these characters with new weapons and armor in a "paper doll" styled interface. The CD version includes full speech.
lol.desc: 在邪惡女巫斯科蒂亞的帶領下，黑暗軍團再次出動。她的目標很明顯：摧毀格萊斯頓要塞及其統治者理查德國王。斯科蒂亞本人最近在從城市礦山獲得“面具”後變得更加強大，獲得了變形的能力。她幾乎勢不可擋，能夠潛入格拉德斯通要塞，毒害理查國王。若不是黎明女巫出面乾預，君主必死無疑。為了找到治愈國王疾病的方法，一群英雄必須踏上冒險之旅，並從黑暗軍團的手中保住自己的生命。 《Lands of Lore: Throne of Chaos》是一款從第一人稱視角觀看的實時地下城角色扮演遊戲。玩家首先選擇四個可用主角之一：Dracoid Ak'shel（高魔法力量）、Huline Kieran（高速）和兩個人類：Michael（高強度）和 Conrad（平衡角色）。每個人都有自己的弱點和優點，但遊戲中的所有能力最終都可以升級。遊戲的大部分內容都是探索偽 3D 迷宮般的地下城。其中大多數都包含秘密區域，有時需要解決謎題才能前進。實時戰鬥涉及點擊每個角色的攻擊或魔法圖標。根據其速度屬性，玩家需要一定的冷卻時間才能再次激活它們。點擊界面允許與一些背景物體進行交互，有時會引起主角或他的同伴的評論。遊戲沒有手動角色發展，而是引入了半自動的升級形式，英雄和同伴的技能分為格鬥、魔法和盜賊技能。當使用特定類型的攻擊殺死敵人時，每個技能等級都會增加：近戰武器增加戰鬥技能，魔法增加魔法技能，遠程武器增加盜賊技能。在遊戲過程中，玩家將組成最多三名英雄的隊伍來尋求治愈方法。玩家可以在“紙娃娃”風格的界面中為這些角色裝備新的武器和盔甲。CD 版本包含完整演講。

laurabow2.original_name: Laura Bow: The Dagger of Amon Ra
laurabow2.name: 勞拉·鮑：阿蒙·拉的匕首
laurabow2.original_desc: The Dagger of Amon Ra is the sequel to Laura's previous adventure, The Colonel's Bequest. Laura Bow, fresh out of college, is hired by a New York newspaper and told to investigate a museum theft. The item is a priceless ancient Egyptian artifact, and possible suspects prove plentiful. During a party to celebrate the opening of the museum's new section, someone is murdered and Laura, after asking to be allowed to investigate, is locked in. This sets the stage for a series of murders, much in the same vein as the original game.
laurabow2.desc: 阿蒙·拉的匕首是勞拉之前的冒險《上校的遺贈》的續集。勞拉·鮑 (Laura Bow) 剛從大學畢業，受聘於紐約一家報紙，並受命調查一起博物館失竊案。該物品是一件無價的古埃及文物，而且可能的嫌疑人有很多。在慶祝博物館新館開幕的聚會上，有人被謀殺，勞拉在請求允許調查後被鎖在裡面。這為一系列謀殺案埋下了伏筆，與原版遊戲的風格非常相似。

lsl3.original_name: Leisure Suit Larry 3: Passionate Patti In Pursuit of the Pulsating Pectorals
lsl3.name: 休閒套裝拉里3：熱情的帕蒂追逐脈動的胸肌
lsl3.original_desc: Leisure Suit Larry III: Passionate Patti in Pursuit of the Pulsating Pectorals is the third entry in the Leisure Suit Larry series of graphical adventure games published by Sierra On-Line. It was developed for multiple platforms including DOS, Atari ST and Amiga. The game utilizes Sierras Creative Interpreter (SCI0), resulting in a graphic style similar to its immediate predecessor, as well as a larger repertoire of MIDI music.
lsl3.desc: 《休閒服拉里 III：熱情的帕蒂追逐脈動的胸肌》是 Sierra On-Line 發行的休閒服拉里系列圖形冒險遊戲的第三款作品。它是為多種平台開發的，包括 DOS、Atari ST 和 Amiga。該遊戲利用 Sierras Creative Interpreter (SCI0)，產生與其前身類似的圖形風格，以及更大的 MIDI 音樂曲目。

lsl5.original_name: Leisure Suit Larry 5 - Passionate Patti Does Some Undercover Work
lsl5.name: 休閒套裝拉里 5 - 熱情的帕蒂做一些臥底工作
lsl5.original_desc:
The absence of a "Leisure Suit Larry 4" forms the basis of this newest installment, as Julius Biggs has stolen the 'missing floppies' of the game and caused Larry Laffer to become amnesiac. Larry is now in the adult film industry, working for a Mafia-connected company known as PornProdCorp. His boss sends him across the United States to scout for models to appear in "America's Sexiest Home Videos".

Meanwhile, Patti is recruited by the FBI to dig up incriminating evidence on two record companies which are suspected of hiding subliminal messages in their songs. At the same time, PornProdCorp schemes to eliminate the competition in their industry by donating money to CANE (Conservatives Against Nearly Everything).
lsl5.desc:
《Leisure Suit Larry 4》的缺失構成了最新一期的基礎，因為朱利葉斯·比格斯偷走了遊戲的“丟失的軟盤”，並導致拉里·拉弗失憶。拉里現在從事成人電影行業，為一家與黑手黨有聯繫的公司 PornProdCorp 工作。他的老闆派他穿越美國尋找出現在“美國最性感家庭視頻”中的模特。

與此同時，帕蒂被聯邦調查局招募來挖掘兩家唱片公司的犯罪證據，這兩家唱片公司涉嫌在歌曲中隱藏潛意識信息。與此同時，PornProdCorp 計劃通過向 CANE（反對幾乎一切的保守派）捐款來消除行業內的競爭。

lsl6.original_name: Leisure Suit Larry 6: Shape Up or Slip Out!
lsl6.name: 休閒套裝 Larry 6：塑形或溜走！
lsl6.original_desc:
Shape Up or Slip Out! is the fifth game in Al Lowes Leisure Suit Larry series. All the events from the previous games are forgotten. Larry is once again single, and again his goal is to capture the interest of various ladies. By sheer coincidence, Larry finds himself on a TV Game Show called Stallions. He wins a weekend at the Spa Resort, La Costa Lotta. Naturally, there are some beautiful women in the spa who are just dreaming about such a wonderful, handsome man as Larry! Uh... or is it really so? It is the players goal to find out!

This instalment focuses more on conversations with women and puzzles than on the storyline. The entire game is spent at La Costa Lotta. There are plenty of traditional inventory-based puzzles to solve in the game. Larry can die, but the player is allowed to try again every time that happens, without the need to restore a saved game. This is also the first Larry game with SVGA graphics, and voice-overs in the CD version.
lsl6.desc:
塑造身材或溜走！是Al Lowes Leisure Suit Larry系列的第五場比賽。之前比賽的所有事件都被遺忘了。拉里再次單身，他的目標又是吸引各種女士的興趣。純屬巧合，拉里發現自己出現在一個名為“種馬”的電視遊戲節目中。他贏得了在 La Costa Lotta 溫泉度假村度過一個週末的機會。當然，水療中心裡有一些漂亮的女人只是夢想著像拉里這樣美妙、英俊的男人！呃……或者真的是這樣嗎？玩家的目標就是找出答案！

這一部分更多地關注與女性的對話和謎題，而不是故事情節。整場比賽都在La Costa Lotta 進行。遊戲中有很多傳統的基於庫存的謎題需要解決。拉里可能會死，但玩家可以在每次發生這種情況時重試，而無需恢復已保存的遊戲。這也是第一款採用 SVGA 圖形和 CD 版本配音的 Larry 遊戲。

lsl1sci.original_name: Leisure Suit Larry 1: The Land of the Lounge Lizards
lsl1sci.name: 休閒服拉里1：休息室蜥蜴之地
lsl1sci.original_desc: Leisure Suit Larry 1: In the Land of the Lounge Lizards is a remake of the first game in the Leisure Suit Larry series. It introduces a new interface. Instead of typing commands, the player performs the desired actions by choosing appropriate icons, and then clicking on objects on the screen to interact with them. The graphics are now 256 color VGA. There is also much more music than in the original version, and it supports more advanced sound formats.
lsl1sci.desc: 《休閒套裝拉里 1：休息室蜥蜴之地》是休閒套裝拉里系列第一款遊戲的重製版。它引入了一個新的界面。玩家無需輸入命令，而是通過選擇適當的圖標來執行所需的操作，然後單擊屏幕上的對象與它們交互。顯卡現在是 256 色 VGA。音樂也比原始版本多得多，並且支持更高級的聲音格式。

loom.name: 織布機
loom.original_desc:
Loom was the fourth game to use the SCUMM scripting language. The game follows Bobbin Threadbare as he learns how to use his magical powers through his distaff and as he eventually saves the world from the Lord of Chaos, who was unraveling the Loom (the source of power for the members of the weaver's guild).

Loom is an adventure game that sets itself apart from other titles in the genre through its unique gameplay system: the player character does not carry items around, but rather manipulates objects through the use of spells (called "drafts" in the game). The drafts themselves are woven by playing magical notes on a special instrument called "distaff". All the puzzles in the game are solved by learning and correctly applying these drafts. 

The CD DOS version of the game has enhanced 256-color graphics, audio tracks, and full voice acting. However, it also removes a few close-up scenes and conversations.
loom.desc:
Loom 是第四款使用 SCUMM 腳本語言的遊戲。遊戲講述了梭賓·斯萊特貝爾 (Bobbin Threadbare) 學習如何通過他的手杖使用他的魔法力量，並最終從混沌之王手中拯救世界，混沌之王正在解開織布機（織布工行會成員的力量來源）。

Loom 是一款冒險遊戲，通過其獨特的遊戲系統將自己與該類型的其他遊戲區分開來：玩家角色不會隨身攜帶物品，而是通過使用咒語（在遊戲中稱為“草稿”）來操縱物體。草稿本身是通過在一種稱為“distaff”的特殊樂器上演奏神奇的音符而編織而成的。遊戲中的所有謎題都是通過學習並正確應用這些草稿來解決的。

遊戲的 CD DOS 版本具有增強的 256 色圖形、音軌和完整的配音。然而，它也刪除了一些特寫場景和對話。

lure.name: 誘惑的誘惑
lure.original_desc: Lure of the Temptress is Revolution Softwares debut point-and-click adventure game published by Virgin Interactive Entertainment. It was released in June 1992 for Atari ST, MS-DOS and Amiga. The player assumes the role of a young peasant named Diermot who has to overthrow an evil sorceress. Lure of the Temptress is the first game built with the Virtual Theatre engine, which Revolution used in the subsequent games Beneath a Steel Sky and the first two games in the Broken Sword series. It was received favourably by critics, a commercial success and re-released as freeware on April 1, 2003.
lure.desc: 《誘惑的誘惑》是由 Virgin Interactive Entertainment 發行的 Revolution Softwares 首款點擊式冒險遊戲。它於 1992 年 6 月發布，適用於 Atari ST、MS-DOS 和 Amiga。玩家扮演一位名叫迪爾莫特的年輕農民，他必須推翻邪惡的女巫。《誘惑的誘惑》是第一款使用虛擬劇場引擎構建的遊戲，Revolution 在隨後的遊戲《鐵甲天下》和《斷劍》系列的前兩款遊戲中都使用了該引擎。它受到了評論家的好評，取得了商業上的成功，並於 2003 年 4 月 1 日作為免費軟件重新發布。

maniac.name: 瘋狂大廈
maniac.original_desc: Maniac Mansion is a 1987 graphic adventure video game developed and published by Lucasfilm Games. It follows teenage protagonist Dave Miller as he attempts to rescue his girlfriend from a mad scientist, whose mind has been enslaved by a sentient meteor. The player uses a point-and-click interface to guide Dave and two of his six playable friends through the scientists mansion while solving puzzles and avoiding dangers. Gameplay is non-linear, and the game must be completed in different ways based on the players choice of characters. Initially released for the Commodore 64 and Apple II, Maniac Mansion was Lucasfilm Games first self-published product.
maniac.desc: Maniac Mansion 是一款 1987 年由 Lucasfilm Games 開發和發行的圖形冒險視頻遊戲。影片講述了十幾歲的主角戴夫·米勒試圖從一位瘋狂科學家手中救出他的女朋友的故事，這位瘋狂科學家的思想被一顆有感知的流星所奴役。玩家使用點擊式界面引導戴夫和他的六個可玩朋友中的兩個穿過科學家宅邸，同時解決謎題並避免危險。遊戲玩法是非線性的，遊戲必鬚根據玩家對角色的選擇以不同的方式完成。Maniac Mansion 最初針對 Commodore 64 和 Apple II 發布，是 Lucasfilm Games 第一個自行發布的產品。

monkey2.name: 猴島2：勒查克的複仇
monkey2.original_desc: LeChucks Revenge is set in the fictional Tri-Island Area of the Caribbean, several months after The Secret of Monkey Island. The game opens in medias res as Guybrush Threepwood hangs on a rope above a hole, narrating to Elaine Marley on a separate rope the events that led to this situation. The flashback sequence starts on Scabb Island and constitutes most of the playable games setting. During it, Guybrush also visits Phatt Island, Booty Island, and Dinky Island, voyaging on two different pirate ships.
monkey2.desc: 《LeChucks Revenge》以虛構的加勒比海三島地區為背景，距離《猴島的秘密》幾個月後。比賽在媒體資源中開始，Guybrush Threepwood 掛在洞上方的一根繩子上，用另一根繩子向 Elaine Marley 講述導致這種情況的事件。閃回序列從斯卡布島開始，構成了大部分可玩遊戲的背景。在此期間，蓋布拉什還乘坐兩艘不同的海盜船遊覽了帕特島、藏寶島和丁基島。

freddypharkas.name: 弗雷迪·法卡斯：前沿藥劑師
freddypharkas.original_desc:
The year is 1888; the setting, post-Gold Rush California. As Freddy Pharkas, Frontier Pharmacist, you uncover a treacherous plot to turn your once-thriving metropolis into a ghost town. With pestles and pistols, you defend your bucolic burg from one catastrophe after another: arson, stampedes, hired guns, riverboat gamblers...even terminal flatulence!

Al Lowe has stolen...er, immortalized...every Hollywood Western cliché and character, adding his own perverse twists to produce his funniest game yet! You'll meet the pretty-but-shy Schoolmarm, the Madame with a Heart-of-Gold, the faithful Indian sidekick, and a cast of the most memorable characters ever to grace your monitor's silver screen.
freddypharkas.desc:
時間是 1888 年；背景是後淘金熱時期的加州。作為前沿藥劑師弗雷迪·法卡斯，你揭露了一個將曾經繁榮的大都市變成鬼城的陰謀。用杵和手槍，你保衛你的田園城堡免受一場又一場的災難：縱火、踩踏、僱槍、河船賭徒……甚至是腸胃脹氣！

Al Lowe 竊取了……呃，永垂不朽……每一個好萊塢西部片的陳詞濫調和角色，加上他自己的反常曲折，製作出他迄今為止最有趣的遊戲！你會遇到漂亮但害羞的女校長、心地善良的夫人、忠實的印度夥伴，以及屏幕銀幕上最令人難忘的角色。

sword1.original_name: Broken Sword I: The Shadow of the Templars
sword1.name: 斷劍 I：聖殿騎士的陰影
sword1.original_desc:
George Stobbart is an American tourist on holiday in Paris in the autumn. The story opens with George's quiet coffee at a café rudely interrupted by the explosion of a bomb planted by a man dressed up as a clown. He sets off investigating the explosion and, gradually, he and photo-journalist Nico Collard are drawn into a globe-trotting adventure involving conspiracies, cults and murder, all revolving around the Knights Templar.

The game, which was a critical and commercial success, was released as Circle of Blood in the United States.
sword1.desc:
喬治·斯托巴特是一位秋天在巴黎度假的美國遊客。故事以喬治在一家咖啡館安靜地喝咖啡開始，但被一名裝扮成小丑的男子安放的炸彈爆炸粗暴地打斷了。他開始調查爆炸事件，漸漸地，他和攝影記者尼科·科拉德被捲入了一場涉及陰謀、邪教和謀殺的環球冒險，而這一切都圍繞著聖殿騎士團展開。

該遊戲獲得了評論界和商業上的成功，並在美國以“Circle of Blood”的名稱發行。

pq3.name: 警察任務 3：親屬
pq3.original_desc:
Sonny Bonds, the now sergeant of Lytton police department, thought he could finally enjoy peaceful life with his wife Marie after the drug lord Jessie Bains has been put away for good. However, a series of gruesome murders perpetrated by a sinister cult known as "The Kindred" shocks the city. Marie becomes a victim of their attack and falls into a coma. It becomes Sonny's very personal mission to track down the attackers and make them pay for their crimes.

The Kindred is the third installment of the Police Quest series, its events taking place after those described in Police Quest 2. Like other Sierra adventures of the time, the game uses an icon-based interface for interaction with the environment.
pq3.desc:
現任利頓警察局警長桑尼·邦茲（Sonny Bonds）以為，在毒梟傑西·貝恩斯（Jessie Bains）被永遠監禁後，他終於可以與妻子瑪麗享受平靜的生活了。然而，一個名為“Kindred”的邪惡邪教所犯下的一系列可怕謀殺震驚了這座城市。瑪麗成為他們襲擊的受害者並陷入昏迷。追踪襲擊者並讓他們為自己的罪行付出代價成為桑尼的個人使命。

《The Kindred》是《Police Quest》系列的第三部，其事件發生在《Police Quest 2》之後。與當時的其他 Sierra 冒險遊戲一樣，該遊戲使用基於圖標的界面與環境進行交互。

qfg3.original_name: Quest for Glory III: Wages of War
qfg3.name: 追求榮耀 III：戰爭的代價
qfg3.original_desc: Wages of War is the third game in the Quest for Glory series. It is set in the Africa-like world of Tarna, where the hero travels with paladin Rakeesh, his new Liontaur friend he has met in the previous game. Shortly after his arrival, the hero learns about the conflict between the human Simbani tribe and the seemingly malevolent neighboring Leopardmen. It is now time for our hero to become a skillful diplomat and prevent an upcoming war between the two nations. The basic gameplay system is similar to that of the two preceding games. The game has an adventure-like structure and gameplay elements, including puzzles to solve, inventory items to use, and characters to talk to, as well as a role-playing system with combat and character development. As in the predecessors, the player character can be either a fighter, a thief, or a mage; in this installment, the paladin class is selectable from the beginning of the game (unlike the previous game, where the hero could only earn the title of a paladin during the course of the story). Saved characters from the previous game can be imported.Like in the earlier Quest for Glory games, the main character's parameters increase directly after battles or by repeatedly performing various actions. New to the series is an overworld map on which the hero travels between locations. Hostile encounters may occur randomly while traversing the map. Combat system is similar to the predecessors, with real-time battles where the player selects various offensive and defensive options. Graphics engine and interface in this installment are the same as in the remake of the first game: it has 256-color graphics and an icon-based interface which was used by Sierra for their contemporary adventure games.
qfg3.desc: 《戰爭的代價》是《Quest for Glory》系列的第三款遊戲。故事發生在類似非洲的塔爾納世界，英雄與聖騎士拉基什一起旅行，拉基什是他在前一款遊戲中認識的新獅王朋友。抵達後不久，英雄得知人類辛巴尼部落與看似惡毒的鄰近豹人之間的衝突。現在是我們的英雄成為一名熟練的外交官並阻止兩國之間即將爆發的戰爭的時候了。基本遊戲系統與前兩款遊戲類似。該遊戲具有類似冒險的結構和遊戲元素，包括要解決的謎題、要使用的庫存物品、要交談的角色，以及具有戰鬥和角色發展的角色扮演系統。與前作一樣，玩家角色可以是戰士、盜賊或法師；在本作中，聖騎士職業從遊戲一開始就可以選擇（與前作不同，英雄只能在故事過程中獲得聖騎士稱號）。可以導入前作中保存的角色。與早期的《Quest for Glory》遊戲一樣，主角的參數在戰鬥後或通過重複執行各種動作後直接增加。該系列的新內容是英雄在不同地點之間旅行的世界地圖。在穿越地圖時，敵對遭遇可能會隨機發生。戰鬥系統與前作類似，實時戰鬥，玩家可以選擇各種進攻和防守選項。本期的圖形引擎和界面與第一款遊戲的重製版相同：它具有 256 色圖形和基於圖標的界面，Sierra 在其當代冒險遊戲中使用了該界面。

samnmax.name: 山姆和麥克斯上路
samnmax.original_desc:
Sam & Max, Canine Shamus and hyperkinetic rabbity thing, are the freelance police. Private investigators who receive missions from and are answerable to ''The Commissioner''. Upon the completion of a rescue mission from the clutches of a mad scientist, Sam & Max drive through the opening credits and immediately receive a new assignment: Bruno the Bigfoot is missing from the circus and seems to have kidnapped Trixie, the Giraffe-Neck Girl. Sam & Max are on the case and will follow the mystery all across the United States, even if it takes them to such locations as The World's Largest Ball of Twine and The Mount Rushmore Dinosaur Tarpit.

Sam & Max Hit the Road is a side-scrolling point-and-click adventure game. The player directly controls Sam, though Max will usually follow closely behind and is even available to use directly as an item in the inventory. Sam is able to be directed anywhere on the screen, Look at objects, try to use objects, try to speak to objects and use items from his inventory on objects. Sam & Max must unravel the mystery piece by piece in order to unlock new locations on their map. They can travel between these locations at any time by using the car keys on their police car. During conversation, the player is able to make Sam ask questions of persons, speak non-sequitur exclamations, or ask about specific objects, people, and locations (which are also unlocked as clues are discovered).

The game also features a variety of mini-games, which can be accessed at any time once found. These include Highway-Sufring: a game where the player must jump over exit signs on the interstate, Car Bomb: A variant on Battleship, A Sam & Max coloring book and a Sam & Max dress-up game and Wak-A-Rat.
samnmax.desc:
薩姆和麥克斯、犬舍姆斯和多動的兔子是自由警察。接受“專員”任務並對“專員”負責的私家偵探。完成從瘋狂科學家手中的營救任務後，山姆和麥克斯在片頭字幕中完成任務，並立即接到新任務：大腳布魯諾在馬戲團失踪，並且似乎綁架了長頸鹿女孩特里克西。山姆和麥克斯正在處理此案，並將在美國各地追查這個謎團，即使他們會去世界上最大的麻線球和拉什莫爾山恐龍柏油坑等地點。

Sam & Max Hit the Road 是一款橫向捲軸點擊式冒險遊戲。玩家直接控制山姆，儘管麥克斯通常會緊隨其後，甚至可以直接作為庫存中的物品使用。山姆能夠在屏幕上的任何位置進行引導，查看物體，嘗試使用物體，嘗試與物體交談以及在物體上使用庫存中的物品。山姆和麥克斯必須一點一點解開謎團，才能解鎖地圖上的新地點。他們可以使用警車上的車鑰匙隨時在這些地點之間旅行。在對話過程中，玩家可以讓山姆向人提問，說出不合邏輯的感嘆詞，或者詢問特定的物體、人物和地點（隨著線索的發現，這些也會被解鎖）。

遊戲還設有各種小遊戲，找到後可以隨時訪問。其中包括《Highway-Sufring》：玩家必須跳過州際公路上的出口標誌的遊戲、《汽車炸彈：戰艦》的變體、《Sam & Max》塗色書、《Sam & Max》裝扮遊戲和 Wak-A-Rat。

simon1.name: 魔法師西蒙
simon1.original_desc:
Simon the Sorcerer is an adventure game that was released by Adventure Soft on 2 January 1993 for Amiga and MS-DOS formats. The game's name comes from the account of Simon the Sorceror in Acts 8. The story begins with the protagonist, Simon, as an ordinary teenager. His dog, "Chippy", discovers a chest in the loft of his house containing a spellbook titled "Ye Olde Spellbooke" (which Simon derisively reads as "Ye old-ee spellbook-ee"). Simon throws the book onto the floor in contempt, but a portal opens above it. Chippy goes through the portal and Simon follows.

After entering the portal, Simon finds himself in another world. After escaping from some goblins who intended to eat him, he discovers that he has been brought on a quest to rescue the wizard Calypso from the evil sorcerer Sordid.
simon1.desc:
《魔法師西蒙》是一款冒險遊戲，由 Adventure Soft 於 1993 年 1 月 2 日發行，適用於 Amiga 和 MS-DOS 格式。遊戲的名字來源於《使徒行傳》第八章中魔法師西門的敘述。故事從主角西門作為一個普通的青少年開始。他的狗“Chippy”在他家的閣樓裡發現了一個箱子，裡面有一本名為“Ye Olde Spellbooke”的咒語書（西蒙嘲笑地讀作“Ye old-ee咒語書-ee”）。西蒙輕蔑地將書扔到地板上，但上面打開了一個傳送門。Chippy 穿過傳送門，Simon 跟在後面。

進入傳送門後，西蒙發現自己進入了另一個世界。在逃離了一些想要吃掉他的妖精之後，他發現自己被帶去執行一項任務，從邪惡的巫師索迪德手中拯救巫師卡里普索。

simon2.original_name: Simon the Sorcerer II: The Lion, the Wizard and the Wardrobe
simon2.name: 魔法師西蒙二世：獅子、巫師和魔衣櫥
simon2.original_desc:
The Evil wizard Sordid is brought back to life when a magic-book of his is set ablaze and thrown into the middle of a chalkboard pentagram by the father of Runt, a young boy wanting to become a mighty sorcerer. Sordid promises him that he can become his apprentice if he helps him exact his vengeance on Simon.

Several months later, Sordid's Fortress of Doom is reconstructed and Sordid has a new robotic body. He sends a magical wardrobe to fetch Simon but it accidentally ends up on the doorstep of Calypso, the wizard Simon had to save in the last game. Simon then starts to look for a fuel called mucusade which he needs to power the wardrobe in order to get home.
simon2.desc:
當邪惡巫師索爾迪德的一本魔法書被小男孩朗特的父親點燃並扔進黑板五角星中間時，索爾迪德復活了。朗特是一個想要成為強大巫師的小男孩。索爾迪向他保證，如果他能幫助他向西蒙報仇，他就可以成為他的學徒。

幾個月後，索爾迪德的末日堡壘被重建，索爾迪德擁有了新的機器人身體。他派了一個神奇的衣櫃去接西蒙，但它不小心落在了卡呂普索的家門口，卡呂普索是西蒙在上一場遊戲中必須拯救的巫師。然後西蒙開始尋找一種叫做粘液的燃料，他需要這種燃料來為衣櫃提供動力才能回家。

sq4.original_name: Space Quest IV: Roger Wilco and the Time Rippers
sq4.name: 太空探索 IV：羅傑·威爾科和時間撕裂者
sq4.original_desc: Following his humorous adventures in previous game, Roger Wilco is relaxing at his favorite pub somewhere in time and space when heavily armed soldiers enter the room. Carrying a parting message from Roger's old nemesis, Sludge Vohaul, they plan to get rid of the janitorial hero, execution style. That is, until a man with an over-sized hair dryer helps Roger escape through a time rip into the future. Now Roger Wilco has woken up on his home planet, some time in a meta-fictional Space Quest XII. It is a grim, dystopian future: the series has gone to ruin without its hero, and Vohaul rules supreme. Roger must find a way to avoid Vohaul's henchmen, fulfill his destiny, and learn about a few surprises that await him in his own future.
sq4.desc: 繼上一款遊戲中的幽默冒險之後，羅傑·威爾科正在時空某處他最喜歡的酒吧里放鬆身心，這時全副武裝的士兵進入了房間。他們帶著羅傑的宿敵污泥沃哈爾的臨別贈言，計劃擺脫清潔英雄的執行風格。也就是說，直到一個帶著超大吹風機的男人幫助羅傑逃離了通往未來的時間裂縫。現在羅傑·威爾科在他的家鄉星球上醒來，在超虛構的《太空探索 XII》中的某個時間。這是一個嚴峻的、反烏托邦的未來：失去了英雄，該系列已經走向毀滅，而沃豪爾則佔據了至高無上的地位。羅傑必須找到一種方法來避開沃豪爾的追隨者，完成他的命運，並了解在他自己的未來等待著他的一些驚喜。

sq5.original_name: Space Quest V: The Next Mutation
sq5.name: 太空探索 V：下一個突變
sq5.original_desc: After travelling back and forth through time in the previous game, Roger Wilco is back in the Starfleet Acadamy, serving as both a cadet and a janitor. Cheating his way through the Starfleet Aptitude Test, Roger is finally given the rank of captain, his own ship (a garbage scow) and a mission: to explore strange new worlds (which no man in his right mind would explore), to seek out new life and new civilizations (which grew out of the massive amounts of trash Roger will collect on his way), to boldly go where no man has gone before. Step by step Roger will have to unveil a galaxy-wide biohazardous material dumping scheme, solve the mystery of the disappearance of a fellow Starfleet captain and his ship, and confront an agent of an old nemesis.
sq5.desc: 在上一款遊戲中穿越時空後，羅傑·威爾科回到了星際艦隊學院，擔任學員和看門人。通過作弊通過星際艦隊能力測試，羅傑最終獲得了船長的軍銜、他自己的船（一艘垃圾船）和一項使命：探索陌生的新世界（任何頭腦清醒的人都不會去探索），尋找新的生命和新的文明（它們是從羅傑在途中收集的大量垃圾中產生的），大膽地去往沒有人去過的地方。羅傑必須一步步揭開一個覆蓋整個銀河系的生物危險材料傾倒計劃，解開一位星際艦隊船長及其飛船失踪的謎團，並對抗一個宿敵的特工。

sq1sci.original_name: Space Quest I: Roger Wilco in the Sarien Encounter
sq1sci.name: 太空探索 I：羅傑·威爾科遭遇薩里恩
sq1sci.original_desc: Space Quest 1: Roger Wilco in the Sarien Encounter is a remake of the original release of Space Quest: Chapter I - The Sarien Encounter. The new version has enhanced graphics (256 color VGA) and soundblaster support. It uses the SCI game engine (point-and-click interface, icons along the top) rather than the AGI engine (mixed point-and-click with text parser). Some of the puzzles have been slightly changed to accommodate the new interface and it is also possible to skip the arcade part. There are a few additional scenes and more elaborate text descriptions, mostly enhancing the humorous effect.
sq1sci.desc: 《太空探索 1：遭遇薩里恩的羅傑·威爾科》是原版《太空探索：第一章 - 遭遇薩里恩》的重製版。新版本增強了圖形（256 色 VGA）和 Soundblaster 支持。它使用 SCI 遊戲引擎（點擊式界面，頂部的圖標）而不是 AGI 引擎（混合點擊式與文本解析器）。一些謎題已稍微更改以適應新界面，也可以跳過街機部分。還有一些額外的場景和更詳盡的文字描述，主要增強了幽默效果。

sq2.name: 太空探索 II：沃哈爾的複仇
sq2.original_desc: The ace janitor Roger Wilco thought he'd seen the last of Sludge Vohaul. However, like every evil scientist is supposed to, Vohaul returns with an even meaner scheme. This time he intends to infest the planet Xenon with thousands of genetically engineered door-to-door life insurance salesmen. The last thing he wants is Roger messing things up, and so the brave janitor is captured and brought to the planet Labion to spend the rest of his days working in Vohaul's mines. Fortunately, the shuttle that takes him to the mines crashes, and Roger is the only survivor. He will have to survive the dangers of the jungle planet Labion, and eventually stop Vohaul from executing his mad plan.
sq2.desc: 王牌看門人羅傑·威爾科以為他已經看到了污泥沃哈爾的最後一面。然而，就像每個邪惡科學家應該做的那樣，沃哈爾帶著一個更卑鄙的計劃回來了。這一次，他打算讓數千名基因改造的上門人壽保險推銷員遍布氙氣星球。他最不想看到的就是羅傑把事情搞砸，因此這位勇敢的看門人被抓獲並帶到拉比恩星球，在沃豪爾的礦井中度過餘生。幸運的是，載他前往礦井的航天飛機墜毀，羅傑是唯一的倖存者。他必須在叢林星球拉比恩的危險中生存下來，並最終阻止沃豪爾執行他的瘋狂計劃。

sq3.original_name: Space Quest III: The Pirates Of Pestulon
sq3.name: 太空探索 III：佩斯圖隆海盜
sq3.original_desc: Narrowly escaping the events of Space Quest II: Vohaul's Revenge, Roger Wilco's escape pod floats through space. As just another metallic item of junk, it's soon picked up by an interstellar garbage hauler. Waking up in a pile of trash, quite familiar for this janitor-turned-hero, Roger Wilco must somehow escape. Once given access to the rest of the galaxy, he'll soon find himself having to avoid a collections cyborg for payments overdue, dealing with the corporate prison of software company Scummsoft, and having to digest the greasy food from the galaxy's finest hamburger joint.
sq3.desc: 羅傑·威爾科 (Roger Wilco) 的逃生艙漂浮在太空中，僥倖逃脫了《太空探索 II：沃哈爾的複仇》中的事件。作為另一種金屬垃圾，它很快就被星際垃圾運輸車撿了起來。羅傑·威爾科在一堆垃圾中醒來，這對於這位看門人出身的英雄來說非常熟悉，他必須想辦法逃脫。一旦能夠進入銀河系的其他地方，他很快就會發現自己必須避開催收機器人逾期付款、與軟件公司 Scummsoft 的公司監獄打交道，並且必須消化銀河系最好的漢堡店的油膩食物。

kyra1.original_name: The Legend of Kyrandia: Book I - Fables & Fiends
kyra1.name: 凱蘭迪亞傳奇：第一冊 - 寓言與惡魔
kyra1.original_desc:
The Legend of Kyrandia is the first in a trilogy of adventure games by Westwood. In this game the player controls Brandon, grandson of Kallak - a wizard of the realm of Kyrandia. Malcolm, a psychotic jester imprisoned in the past by Kallak, has broken free and wishes to take over the land as well as lay down his revenge. He turns Kallak into stone leaving him with only his eyes, so that Kallak is not denied his tears for Kyrandia's sake.

This is where Brandon steps in; returning home shortly afterwards only to find that his grandfather has been turned into stone, Brandon is being told by a messenger from the Realm of the Land that he has been chosen to embark on a journey that will rid this realm of Malcolm and his evil. He has to prove himself not only a hero, but a worthy heir to the crown and ultimately of becoming a king.

Throughout the journey Brandon will collect many items and also learn how to master magic. Available spells include disappearing, healing yourself, summoning ice upon fire and shifting into a wisp. Interaction with the environment is confined to highlighted items, and a single cursor is used for all actions, without differentiating precise commands.
kyra1.desc:
《凱蘭迪亞傳奇》是 Westwood 冒險遊戲三部曲中的第一部。在這款遊戲中，玩家控制凱蘭迪亞王國巫師卡拉克的孫子佈蘭登。馬爾科姆是一個曾經被卡拉克囚禁的精神病小丑，現在已經掙脫束縛，希望接管這片土地並進行複仇。他把卡拉克變成了石頭，只留下了他的眼睛，這樣卡拉克就不會為了凱蘭迪亞而流淚。

這就是布蘭登介入的地方；布蘭登回到家後不久，卻發現他的祖父已經變成了石頭，一位來自大地王國的使者告訴布蘭登，他已被選中踏上一段旅程，以清除這個王國中的馬爾科姆和他的邪惡。他不僅要證明自己是英雄，而且要證明自己是王位的繼承人，並最終成為國王。

在整個旅程中，布蘭登將收集許多物品並學習如何掌握魔法。可用的法術包括消失、治愈自己、召喚冰火和化為一縷。與環境的交互僅限於突出顯示的項目，並且單個光標用於所有操作，而不區分精確的命令。

kyra2.original_name: The Legend of Kyrandia: Book II - The Hand of Fate
kyra2.name: 凱蘭迪亞傳奇：第二冊 - 命運之手
kyra2.original_desc:
The land of Kyrandia is disappearing piece by piece and you are the offbeat, young mystic who must voyage to the center of the world to break the curse and save it. Your surreal journey will twist even the sharpest of minds. Traveling through a vast, weirdly beautiful terrain, you must concoct potions, cast spells and lure the help of some very bizarre inhabitants to uncover the secrets that doom Kyrandia.

The Hand of Fate is the second installment in the Kyrandia series. The gameplay is similar to that of the previous game. Interaction is possible only with highlighted objects on the screen, and is reduced to a single cursor, without the distinction of separate commands or branching dialogues.
kyra2.desc:
凱蘭迪亞的土地正在一點點消失，你是一個另類的年輕神秘主義者，必須航行到世界中心打破詛咒並拯救它。即使是最敏銳的頭腦也會扭曲你的超現實之旅。穿越一片廣闊而奇異的美麗地形，你必須配製藥劑、施展咒語並引誘一些非常奇怪的居民的幫助，以揭開毀滅凱蘭迪亞的秘密。

《命運之手》是凱蘭迪亞系列的第二部。遊戲玩法與前作類似。交互只能與屏幕上突出顯示的對象進行，並且被簡化為單個光標，沒有單獨命令或分支對話的區別。

zak.original_name: Zak Mckracken And The Alien Mindbenders
zak.name: 扎克·麥克拉肯和外星人 Mindbenders
zak.original_desc: To Zak McKracken, it's just another day at the office. He's the roving reporter who's scoffed at by his peers. Dreaded by his creditors. And relished by readers of his tabloid sleaze. But one night in bed, Zak McKracken uncovers evidence of an extraterrestrial plot. And unlike all the other "alien conspiracies" his tabloid churns out with regularity, this one's for real! Another comedy thriller from Lucasfilm Games! Featuring zany humor and off-the-wall one-liners, challenging, mind-bending mystery, travel to exotic locations around the world, high resolution 3D graphics, and more!
zak.desc: 對於扎克·麥克拉肯來說，這只是辦公室的又一天。他是一位被同行嘲笑的流動記者。令債主們畏懼不已。並受到他的小報醜聞的讀者的喜愛。但有一天晚上，扎克·麥克拉肯在床上發現了外星人陰謀的證據。與他的小報定期炮製的所有其他“外星人陰謀”不同，這是真的！盧卡斯影業遊戲的另一部喜劇驚悚片！具有滑稽的幽默和離奇的俏皮話、具有挑戰性、令人費解的神秘、到世界各地異國他鄉旅行、高分辨率 3D 圖形等等！
